column3: sɛ me tsir yɛɛ esuesu
column4: na m'enyiwa yɛɛ nyinsuwa nsunyiwa a
column5: nkyɛ mubosu me man n'atɔfoe no adzekyee na adzesaa!"

column3: nkyɛ meenya akwantsemfo asoɛe wɔ sar do ɛ; nkyɛ mebɛdan me man egya
column4: na mefi hɔn nkyɛn akɔ! Na hɔn nyinara yɛ awartofo

column2: "Wɔkontom hɔn tɛkyerɛma dɛ egyen; Wɔagye ntsin wɔ asaase no do wɔ atorsɛm mu
column3: na nnyɛ nokwar mu bi a; na wofi mbusu mu kɔ mbusu mu

column2: "Hom mu biara nhwɛ yie wɔ ne nyɛnko ho
column3: na mma hom nntwer nua biara: na nua biara bedzi emim pasaa
column4: na nyɛnko biara akasakasa asɛɛ nkorɔfo edzin."

column3: na obiara nnka nokwar; wɔakyerɛkyerɛ hɔn tɛkyerɛma atorsɛm dzi; wɔberɛ hɔnho wɔ emumuyɛ ne yɛ ho."

column2: "Wo tsenabea wɔ ndaadaa finimfin; ndaadaa ntsi na wɔpow dɛ wobohu me
column3: EWURADZE na ɔse."

column2: "Dɛm ntsi mbrɛ dɔm EWURADZE se nye yi
column3: Hwɛ
column5: na masɔ hɔn ahwɛ; na mebɛyɛ no dɛn koraa wɔ me man ho?"

column2: "Hɔn tɛkyerɛma yɛ ewudzi egyen menaba; ɔkasa ndaadaa: obi dze n'ano kasa asomdwee mu kyerɛ ne nyɛnko
column3: naaso n'akoma mu dze

column2: "Aso monnkɔtwe hɔn aso wɔ ndzɛmba yinom ntsi? EWURADZE na ɔse: aso me kra rinndzi wer wɔ dɛm man yi do?"
"Mbepɔw no ntsi mubotue osu na sukwadwom
column3: na sar do dzidzibea ntsi
column5: osiandɛ wɔahyew ma obi nndua hɔ; eso adasa nntse anantwi ndze; wimuwimu noho nnoma na mbowa nyinara eguanguan

column3: nsɔ tsenabea; na mebɛma Juda nkurow ayɛ nkurofo a obiara nntse mu."
ma ɔaatse iyi ase? Woana nye nyia EWURADZE n'ano akasa akyerɛ no
column4: ma ɔaaka akyerɛ? Ebɛnadze ntsi na asaase no asɛɛ na ɔahyew dɛ sar

column3: Osiandɛ wɔadan me mbra a medze sii hom enyim no egya

column2: "na mbom woekedzi hɔnankasa hɔn akoma ne ntsintsiman ekyir
column3: na Baalim a hɔn egyanom kyerɛkyerɛɛ hɔn no ekyir ntsi:"
Israel Nyankopɔn no se nye yi
column7: na mama hɔn ɔbɔwema nsu ma wɔaanom."

column2: "Mobɔbɔ hɔn so apetse amanaman a hɔn anaa hɔn egyanom nnyim hɔn mu: na mebɛma afona aka hɔn do
column3: ekodu dɛ mama wɔasa."
Hom ndwendwen ho
column4: na hom mfrɛ mbaa a wonyim su ma wɔmbra; na hom nsoma ma wɔnkɛfrɛ mbaa enyansafo ma wɔmbra:"

column2: "na wɔnyɛ ntsɛm ntu sukwadwom mma hɛn
column3: ma hɛn enyiwa nwora nyinsuwa

column2: "Na yɛatse sukwadwom ndze fi Zion dɛ
column3: Mbrɛ woedua asɛɛ hɛn afa a! Hɛn enyim egu ase koraa
column5: osiandɛ woedwuruw hɛn tsenabew egu famu."

column3: hom ntsie EWURADZE n'asɛm
column4: na hom mma n'anosɛm nkɔ hom asomu
column6: na obiara nkyerɛkyerɛ ne nyɛnko ewuotwa."

column2: "Na owu afow aba hɛn ntokura mu
column3: ɔahɛn hɛn nhemfie; dɛ obotwa mbofra efi abrɔn do
Adasa efun bogugu dɛ mfuwa pradada do efikyir
column4: na dɛ eburotwafo ekyir ekuwekuw na obiara nnkɔboaboa ano."

column3: Mma onyansafo nnhyehyɛ noho wɔ ne nyansaa mu
column4: eso mma ɔhoɔdzenfo nnhyehyɛ noho wɔ n'ahoɔdzen mu
column5: na ɔhonyafo nnhyehyɛ noho wɔ n'ahonya mu:"

column3: ɔnhyehyɛ noho wɔ iyi mu
column6: dɛ emi nye EWURADZE a meyɛ adɔyɛ
column8: na tsenenee wɔ asaase do: na ndzɛmba iyinom mu na m'enyigye wɔ

column3: nda bi reba
column5: dɛ mebɛba abɛtsea hɔn a wɔyɛ twatsiafo wɔ hɔn monomonomyɛ mu;"

column3: na Juda
column7: na hɔn a woetwitwa ntakuwa a wɔtsetse sar do: na amanaman nyinara yɛ monomonomfo
column8: na Israel fifo nyinara yɛ akoma mu monomonomfo."
